verses.verse: ( In You My Soul Takes Refuge) ( 90 22:1-5 ;  230 108:1-13 ;  230 142:1-7 ) לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. [To the tune of] אַל־ <WH516> ’al- vvv תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <WH516> taš·ḥêṯ “ Do Not Destroy. ” לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David, מִכְתָּ֑ם <WH4387> miḵ·tām A Miktam ( Miktam is probably a musical or liturgical term; used for and 56–60.) בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <WH1272> bə·ḇā·rə·ḥōw when he fled מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> mip·pə·nê·šā- from שָׁ֝א֗וּל <WH7586> ’ūl Saul בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH4631> bam·mə·‘ā·rāh into the cave. חָנֵּ֤נִי <WH2603> ḥān·nê·nî Have mercy on me, אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God, חָנֵּ֗נִי <WH2603> ḥān·nê·nî have mercy, כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî for בְךָ֮ Prep│2ms ( ḇə·ḵā) in You חָסָ֪יָה 2620 V-Qal-Perf-3fs ( ḥā·sā·yāh) takes refuge. נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י 5315 N-fsc│1cs ( nap̄·šî) my soul וּבְצֵֽל־ 6738 Conj-w, Prep-b│N-msc ( ū·ḇə·ṣêl-) In the shadow כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ 3671 N-fpc│2ms ( kə·nā·p̄e·ḵā) of Your wings אֶחְסֶ֑ה 2620 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’eḥ·seh) I will take shelter עַ֝֗ד 5704 Prep ( ‘aḏ) until יַעֲבֹ֥ר 5674 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( ya·‘ă·ḇōr) has passed. הַוּֽוֹת׃ 1942 N-fp ( haw·wō·wṯ) the danger

אֶ֭קְרָא <WH7121> ’eq·rā I cry out לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> lê·lō·hîm to God עֶלְי֑וֹן <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn Most High, ( Hebrew Elohim-Elyon) לָ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> lā·’êl to God גֹּמֵ֥ר <WH1584> gō·mêr who fulfills עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> ‘ā·lāy His purpose for me.

יִשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> yiš·laḥ He reaches down מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <WH8064> miš·šā·ma·yim from heaven וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH3467> wə·yō·wō·šî·‘ê·nî and saves me; חֵרֵ֣ף <WH2778> ḥê·rêp̄ He rebukes שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <WH7602> šō·’ă·p̄î those who trample me. סֶ֑לָה <WH5542> se·lāh Selah יִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> yiš·laḥ sends forth אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God חַסְדּ֥וֹ <WH2617> ḥas·dōw His loving devotion וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH571> wa·’ă·mit·tōw and His truth.

נַפְשִׁ֤י׀ <WH5315> nap̄·šî My soul בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> bə·ṯō·wḵ [is] among לְבָאִם֮ <WH3833> lə·ḇā·’im the lions; אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <WH7901> ’eš·kə·ḇāh I lie down לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <WH3857> lō·hă·ṭîm with ravenous beasts — בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> bə·nê- ... אָדָ֗ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām [with] men שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <WH8127> nê·hem whose teeth חֲנִ֣ית <WH2595> ḥă·nîṯ are spears וְחִצִּ֑ים <WH2671> wə·ḥiṣ·ṣîm and arrows, וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> ū·lə·šō·w·nām whose tongues חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ḥe·reḇ swords. חַדָּֽה׃ <WH2299> ḥad·dāh are sharp

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> rū·māh Be exalted, עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- above הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim the heavens; אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God, עַ֖ל <WH5921> ‘al cover כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth. כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> kə·ḇō·w·ḏe·ḵā may Your glory

רֶ֤שֶׁת׀ <WH7568> re·šeṯ a net הֵכִ֣ינוּ <WH3559> hê·ḵî·nū They spread לִפְעָמַי֮ <WH6471> lip̄·‘ā·may for my feet; כָּפַ֪ף <WH3721> kā·p̄ap̄ was despondent. נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> nap̄·šî my soul כָּר֣וּ <WH3738> kā·rū They dug לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> lə·p̄ā·nay before me, שִׁיחָ֑ה <WH7882> šî·ḥāh a pit נָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> nā·p̄ə·lū but they themselves have fallen בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <WH8432> ḇə·ṯō·w·ḵāh into it! סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

נָ֘כ֤וֹן <WH3559> nā·ḵō·wn is steadfast, לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> lib·bî My heart אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God, נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> nā·ḵō·wn is steadfast. לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib·bî my heart אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <WH7891> ’ā·šî·rāh I will sing וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <WH2167> wa·’ă·zam·mê·rāh and make music.
